creator: michael@idtect.com
text:
I have tried Tomcat 4.0.4 and 4.1.9 beta to see if that made a
difference but I get the same end result:  When I   set my CATALINA_BASE
to be a directory other than CATALINA_HOME, my webapp is not accessible.
I know my web.xml is loading and my servlets (struts and my own custom
servlets) are initialized, but when I try to access any URL in the
webapp I get 404 errors.  I've tried both JDK 1.4.1beta & 1.3.1.  In the
logfile there are no errors:

creator: michael@idtect.com
text:
Bugzilla is hanging when I try to include portions of my logfiles.  Please 
email me for more information, or see this post:

http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=tomcat-user&m=103000367314894&w=2

creator: remm@apache.org
text: The report is too vague to be useful. Please attach a test webapp.
